alert.note: Alert for Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; Central and South Weld County; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 5:38PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Denver and western Adams Counties through 630 PM MDT... At 537 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over northeastern Commerce City, or 15 miles northeast of Denver, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Northeastern Aurora, northeastern Commerce City, Brighton, Denver International Airport, D.I.A Terminal and Concourses, Lochbuie, Barr Lake and Todd Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
